enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Effective participation in the UNFCCC process: The Secretariat outlined options and proposals for the effective participation of observers in the UNFCCC and Protocol intersessional workshops and meetings of limited membership bodies.
CANADA, with AUSTRALIA and the EU, advocated transparency while recognizing financial realities.
The US supported participation through new approaches, including a constituency system.
